plurals.name: perm_manager_suggest_allow_content
plurals.item: "You've allowed %2$s to access the clipboard %1$d times already. Do you want to always allow %3$s to access the clipboard?"

plurals.name: perm_manager_suggest_deny_content
plurals.item: "You've restricted access to the clipboard for %2$s %1$d times already. Restrict access to the clipboard for %3$s permanently?"
